text:

A lot of foods that most people think they can't live without vegans are happy not to eat, foods such as meat and cheese are absolute no-nos in a vegan diet.

If you thought not eating products that come from animals limited your food choices this video will prove to you otherwise. From McDonald's McVegan burgers to a watermelon that looks like ham, there is an overflow of variety for plant-based dishes across the globe. The meals are not only limited to vegans, anyone is welcome to try these out of the ordinary dishes.

For an experience closer to home, try these:

The Kind Kitchen

This vegan cafe located in Woodstock, Cape Town offers an impressive menu and humorous names for their cold-pressed juices such as the OJ Pimpson juice, get it?

The Greenside Cafe

Great interior and amazing food make this Joburg based spot the place to be. Pick from their large vegan and vegetarian menu, their strawberry three-layered cake comes highly recommended.
